item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 29, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Floating megabomb heaves to near the English coast (79 points | 68 comments)
2. Too much efficiency makes everything worse (2022) (349 points | 134 comments)
3. Text2CAD Generating Sequential CAD Designs from Text Prompts (21 points | 2 comments)
4. Feldera Incremental Compute Engine (22 points | 2 comments)
5. How Discord stores trillions of messages (2023) (260 points | 111 comments)
6. SpaceX launches mission for 2 NASA astronauts who are stuck on the ISS (242 points | 220 comments)
7. NASA is selling a brand-new Moon rover: Never used, one previous owner (25 points | 15 comments)
8. Notes on the Crystal Language (93 points | 29 comments)
9. Show HN: htmgo - build simple and scalable systems with golang + htmx (68 points | 19 comments)
10. How can a jigsaw have two distinct solutions? [video] (31 points | 9 comments)
11. Cores That Don't Count [pdf] (68 points | 9 comments)
12. Measuring Developers' Jobs-to-be-done (34 points | 3 comments)
13. Show HN: Iceoryx2 – Fast IPC Library for Rust, C++, and C (72 points | 17 comments)
14. My Experience Getting Licensed in Ham Radio (2020) (21 points | 6 comments)
15. The perils of transition to 64-bit time_t (231 points | 172 comments)
16. Micro: The magazine for TRS-80 owners (12 points | 3 comments)
17. Illusions of Competence in Monitoring One's Knowledge During Study [pdf] (20 points | 2 comments)
18. Reverse-engineering a three-axis attitude indicator from the F-4 fighter plane (170 points | 58 comments)
19. Solving climate change by abusing thermodynamic scaling laws (31 points | 20 comments)
20. So you want to make pixel art for an Apple II (18 points | 5 comments)
21. The Little Typer (2018) (156 points | 30 comments)
22. The Design of Text Editors (74 points | 38 comments)
23. IBM PC 5150 Model Numbers (27 points | 1 comment)
24. Will plants grow on the moon? (71 points | 81 comments)
25. Theattyr: A terminal theater for playing VT100 art and animations (34 points | 2 comments)
26. Cat memes went viral 100 years ago (117 points | 30 comments)
27. FFT-based ocean-wave rendering, implemented in Godot (749 points | 93 comments)
28. NTSB Issues Urgent Safety Recommendations on Boeing 737 Rudder System (15 points | 14 comments)
29. REPL for Dart (93 points | 40 comments)
30. Britain buys semiconductor factory for defence purposes (176 points | 84 comments)
